body_html:
Actually, I was thinking about adding a test to cl-sanity that simply runs
buildifier and fails if any changes are suggested. The submitter can then
run it themselves to make sure it passes.

On Tue, Jul 19, 2016 at 3:55 PM gunan notifications@github.com wrote:

Jenkins, test this please.

—

body:
Actually, I was thinking about adding a test to cl-sanity that simply runs
buildifier and fails if any changes are suggested. The submitter can then
run it themselves to make sure it passes.

On Tue, Jul 19, 2016 at 3:55 PM gunan notifications@github.com wrote:

> Jenkins, test this please.
> 
> —
